text: Yitzhak "Itzik" Mordechai (, born 22 November 1944) is an Iraqi-born Israeli former general and politician. He was a member of the Knesset between 1996 and 2001. He was Minister of Defense from 1996 until 1999 and Minister of Transport from 1999 until 2000. He retired from politics after being indicted for sexual assaults during his military service and later periods.Yitzhak Mordechai guilty of sexual assault Yitzhak Mordechai guilty of sexual assaultIsraeli Cabinet Member is Accused of Sexually Harassing Female Worker ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:Likud politicians Category:Iraqi politicians Category:Iraqi military people Category:Israeli generals
title: Yitzhak Mordechai
